title: Skins for this patch
body:
So i've been waiting and wanting to get Warring kingdoms nidalee since the patch, but unlike most patches where they are released shortly after, we are actually still waiting, Red's, where are this patches skins? :(

I want my bad ass cougar already.

replies.body:
I'm just glad WK Kat isn't legacy...can someone confirm if WK Nid/High-On-Crack-er Jinx is legacy or not?

{{champion:55}} {{champion:76}} {{champion:222}}

all 3 skins are not legacy. Sweetheart Annie is also not legacy.

http://www.surrenderat20.net/2015/02/red-post-collection-battlecast-poro.html#2

> [{quoted}](name=BarryButcher,realm=OCE,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=HovbhlJR,comment-id=00030000,timestamp=2015-02-09T05:42:05.191+0000)
>
> all 3 skins are not legacy.

AWW YISS
Would it be that bad if they were legacy?

How?

Like your here, and able to buy them, so them being legacy would only make them rarer for you.

> [{quoted}](name=JasonWazza,realm=OCE,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=HovbhlJR,comment-id=000300000000000000000000,timestamp=2015-02-09T10:27:08.845+0000)
>
> How?
> 
> Like your here, and able to buy them, so them being legacy would only make them rarer for you.

Hint some people would rather others have the opportunity to have things rather then the opportunity to be a special snowflake.
I couldn't care either way personally, i just think it's odd to specifically not want them legacy.
It's coming either this week or next week. Please be patient.
I have no patience, i've been hyped for this skin since it was on the PBE.
Riot messed up their timing I think. Chinese New Year is AFTER valentines day, but the Valentines day skins wont be added until 5.3 patch. so yeah... who knows the exact dates
the chinese themed skins wont come out untill after valentines since chinese new year is the weekend after i believe
Lunar Revel skin... Guessing Chinese new year?
